definition: 5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent
lit. lips and teeth (idiom); fig. close partners/interdependent
lit. without the lips, the teeth feel the cold (idiom); fig. intimately interdependent
lit. a donkey's lips do not match a horse's mouth (idiom)/fig. beside the point/incongruous
pinyin: lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

sentences.english: Lipstick on Her Collar? Men Say, ‘O.K.’
sentences.chinese: 她衣领上有唇印？男士说，“没关系”。

sentences.english: Your lips are of be vividly portrayed spring.
sentences.chinese: 你的唇边是呼之欲出的春天。

sentences.english: Let your love in kisses rain. on my lips and eyelids pale.
sentences.chinese: 让伱的爱随吻的密雨降落，落在莪苍白的唇和眼丄。

sentences.english: Standard versions feature a nitrile double-lip seal and standard grease .
sentences.chinese: 标准版本采用腈双密封唇和标准油脂。

sentences.english: With her consent, you can also kiss her.
sentences.chinese: 征得她的同意后，你还能吻她的唇。

sentences.english: Her soul fluttered on her lips like a drop of dew on a flower.
sentences.chinese: 她的灵魂，象花上的一滴露珠，在她的唇边抖颤。

sentences.english: It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
sentences.chinese: 你的热吻非及我唇，而是动我心魂。

sentences.english: Dauntless the slug-horn to my lips I set.
sentences.chinese: 我大胆地将金属号角在我的唇边放好。

sentences.english: She teaches deaf children to lip-read.
sentences.chinese: 她教耳聋儿童运用唇读法。

sentences.english: Durga, with Thy name upon my lips.
sentences.chinese: 杜迦，你的名字挂在我的唇边。

sentences.english: Select a lip pencil that matches the natural color of your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 选用与你唇色一致的唇笔。

sentences.english: Black enamel coated snap fasteners on cuff straps and concealed in pocket flaps.
sentences.chinese: 袖口钮袢和袋口暗袋唇打黑色按扣。

sentences.english: That’s also why lip liner is a must in our later years, too.
sentences.chinese: 这也是为什么我们老年使用唇笔线。

sentences.english: Keep lipstick on your lips and eliminate feathering and smudging.
sentences.chinese: 保存在你的唇上口红而且除去用羽毛复盖和弄脏。

sentences.english: Have not saints lips, and holy palmers too?
sentences.chinese: 圣者与朝圣者难道没有唇？

sentences.english: The laughter died on her lips.
sentences.chinese: 笑意从她唇上渐渐消逝了。

definition: lit. cherry mouth (idiom)/fig. a delicate, ruby-lipped mouth
see 櫻桃小嘴|樱桃小嘴[ying1 tao2 xiao3 zui3]
